meanings.definition: In a generous or plentiful manner.
meanings.sent1: She shared her snacks bounteously with her friends.
meanings.sent2: The farmer's fields were bounteously filled with ripe crops.
meanings.sent3: The magician bounteously pulled endless scarves from his hat.
meanings.sent4: The sun bounteously showered the earth with its golden rays.
meanings.sent5: The kind old lady bounteously donated to the local charity every month.

meanings.sent1: The bounteously decorated room sparkled with lights.
meanings.sent2: Their bounteously decorated tree was the talk of the town.
meanings.sent3: The bounteously generous king was loved by all his subjects.
meanings.sent4: The bounteously flowing river provided water for the entire village.
meanings.sent5: The bounteously spread feast delighted all the guests at the banquet.
